p: Ethyl (E)-2-((1H-pyrrol-1-yl)methyl)-3-phenylacrylate (41). Purification using ethyl acetate/petroleum ether (1:99) allowed the isolation of the product as a colourless oil in 69% yield. It wasn't possible to separate E/Z isomers and they were used as a mixture in the next step. 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.98 (s, 1H), 7.38 (dd, J = 7.5, 2.2 Hz, 5H), δ 7.32 − 7.18 (m, 5H), 6.72 (t, J = 2.1 Hz, 2H), 6.65 (t, J = 2.1 Hz, 2H), 6.57 (s, 1H), 6.12 (t, J = 2.2 Hz, 4H), 4.94 (s, 2H), 4.84 (d, J = 1.5 Hz, 2H), 4.25 (q, J = 7.1 Hz, 2H), 4.09 (q, J = 7.1 Hz, 2H), 1.29 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 3H),1.06 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 3H).
